reason: The purpose of write enhancement is to improve the expressiveness and professionalism of text to make it more lively, precise and readable.

examples.instruction: Enhance the following description of a car: "The car has a comfortable interior."
examples.input: The car has ample legroom and supportive seats that make long drives more enjoyable. Additionally, the sound system is top-notch, allowing passengers to immerse themselves in their favorite tunes while on the road.
examples.output: The car boasts a spacious and inviting interior that is perfect for long drives. With plush seats that offer plenty of legroom, passengers can ride in comfort and style. Furthermore, the car's state-of-the-art sound system delivers excellent audio quality, allowing riders to fully enjoy their music.

examples.instruction: Improve the following sentence: "The restaurant was really good."
examples.input: The restaurant offered an extensive menu with a wide range of options for dietary preferences. The service was excellent, with attentive waitstaff who always had a smile on their faces. Additionally, the ambiance was warm and inviting, making for a welcoming dining experience.
examples.output: The restaurant was a true standout, offering a diverse and mouthwatering menu that caters to all dietary needs. Not only was the service impeccable, with friendly and attentive waitstaff always at the ready, but the ambiance was also warm and inviting, creating a truly unforgettable dining experience.

examples.instruction: Improve the following product description: "The vacuum cleaner is effective at cleaning carpets."
examples.input: The vacuum cleaner boasts a powerful suction that picks up even the most stubborn dirt and debris embedded in carpets. Additionally, it comes equipped with a HEPA filter that captures even the tiniest dust and allergen particles, ensuring a thorough and complete cleaning every time.
examples.output: The vacuum cleaner is a true powerhouse when it comes to cleaning carpets. Thanks to its advanced suction technology, it effortlessly removes even the most embedded dirt and debris, leaving carpets looking and feeling like new. Furthermore, the HEPA filter ensures that every last speck of dust and allergen is captured, making the air in your home cleaner and healthier.

examples.instruction: Enhance the following instructions on baking brownies: "Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Mix the brownie mix, eggs, oil, and water together. Pour the mixture into a greased pan and bake for 25-30 minutes."
examples.input: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Next, carefully mix together the brownie mix, eggs, oil, and water in a large bowl until well combined. Pour the mixture into a generously greased baking pan and smooth out the top. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
examples.output: To achieve a perfectly baked batch of brownies, begin by preheating your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Then, gently mix together the brownie mix, eggs, oil, and water until you have a smooth and uniform batter. Grease your baking pan generously to ensure that the brownies don't stick, and pour the batter carefully into the pan, smoothing out the top for even baking. Pop the pan in the oven and wait patiently for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Once ready, remove the pan from the oven and allow it to cool to room temperature before slicing and serving.

examples.instruction: Enhance the following paragraph about a hiking trail: "The hiking trail is beautiful and challenging."
examples.input: Nestled among lush forests and craggy peaks, the hiking trail offers stunning views of the surrounding landscape at every turn. The trail itself is rigorous and challenging, with steep inclines and rocky terrain that will test even the most seasoned hikers.
examples.output: The hiking trail is a true outdoor wonder, taking hikers on a breathtaking journey through some of the most stunning and rugged terrain around. From rolling hills to craggy peaks, the trail offers panoramic views of the surrounding landscape that will leave you awe-struck. However, be warned: this trail is not for the faint of heart, with steep inclines and tricky terrain that will challenge even the most experienced hikers.
